statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // "0.00"'); if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then branch=$(cd "$cwd" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_info=" (${branch:-unknown})"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[2m%s@%s:%s%s | %s [%s] | Cost: $%s\033[0m" "$user" "$host" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_info" "$model" "$style" "$cost"

hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code needs your attention" with title "Claude Code" sound name "Ping"'
